name: A terrible time (lord)
description:
A time lord has placed a curse on you, limiting your lifetime to a clock. Extend this time by stringing the Lord or his guardians'. Keep in mind that it will be shortened if they strike you.

WASD to move, left-click to strike and right click to shoot. The shot deals great damage, but it comes at a cost.

Defeat the Time lord and his guardians to save the timeline.
